lead_paragraph: DAUBER--Edwin Jules, on April 30, 2016 at 94, of Southbury, CT. Beloved husband of Harriet. Loving father and devoted grandfather. Donations in his memory may be made to Hadassah. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DAUBER, EDWIN JULES
